name: STRAY CAT
description:
STRAY CAT

This is a small game about a homeless cat who decided to save money for a new home. 2D platformer with a side view, where you will play as a brave cat who decided to collect all the coins on his way and destroy evil opponents.

In the game you will definitely have to:
- Collect coins;
- Dodge sharp sawing discs and projectiles;
- Search for the key to the cave;
- Fight with enemies;
- Jump on trampolines;
- Climbing vines;
- Push crates;

Key Features:
- Suitable for children (The game is not very difficult and there is no blood in it);
- The game has original author's graphics;
- Pleasant soundtrack.
